song.englishname: The Skeleton Key To a Skeleton

english.segment1: Freeze the frame. Where I take the blame. I'll make you love me. If it's all I do.
english.segment2: I've got the keys to your heart and I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me. I'll tell the burning to stop but I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me.
english.segment3: I'll freeze the frame. If you'll take the blame, oh girl. You're burning up. The things you touch, And the things you love.
english.segment4: I've got the keys to your heart and I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me. I'll tell the burning to stop but I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me.
english.segment5: Your voice will awaken the man inside. I've been dying to reach your fire. All of my dreams will come true tonight. I've been waiting for all my life.
english.segment6: All of my dreams will come true tonight. All of my dreams will come true..
english.segment7: I've got the keys to your heart and I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me. I'll tell the burning to stop but I'm coming inside. You're never gonna stop me.
english.segment8: I've got the keys to your heart burning inside. You're never gonna stop me.
